translations: 背诵；朗诵（recite 的现在分词）；详述

sentences.sentence: "As for my future plan, I will stick to reading and reciting poems," Lei said.
sentences.translation: “至于我的未来计划，我将坚持阅读和背诵诗歌。”雷说。

sentences.sentence: Reciting poems not only enriches my knowledge, but also makes my job less boring.
sentences.translation: 背诵诗歌不仅丰富了我的知识，也使我的工作不那么无聊。
